website_summaries.verdict: While other DNA kits may emphasize ancestry and ethnicity, this kit concentrates on health issues with a genetic component. Very useful for dieters, athletes, and others exploring healthier lifestyles.
pros: Detailed list of dietary supplements based on DNA results
cons: Test results can take two months or longer to receive

customer_reviews.title: The DNA part was great. I was disappointed though
customer_reviews.text: The DNA part was great. I was disappointed though, that they waited for my health part until they had a list of all my meds and illnesses. After that, it was kind of like, here are some Vitamins we would like to sell you. Don't forget to check with your Doc though. How thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Omami

customer_reviews.title: Beware fake reviews
customer_reviews.text: Very questionable value. The report mostly parroted back the answers to their required questionnaire. Vitagene does not provide raw data that can be submitted to Promethease for more detailed results, as other DNA tests do. Report said I am 'lactose tolerant'. Ha ha ... um ... no. There's a distinct 'buy our supplements' slant to the report. I wish I had investigated more thoroughly before buying this. Additionally, I now see that 2 Amazon review checking sites show that there is a a high level of suspicious reviews here. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: sallyforth

customer_reviews.title: May have gone out of business??
customer_reviews.text: It has been 8 weeks since I sent my sample kit back in to vitagene's labs. I started emailing two weeks ago when I didn't get any results. I called again last week with no results. This week, when I log in, their website tells me my kit was rejected and someone will be in touch with me shortly. Only no one has. When I call, it goes to a voicemail and no one responds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The questionair attached to my file, questioned personal and ...
customer_reviews.text: The questionair attached to my file, questioned personal and private information such as Ethnicity, Height and weight, health diagnoses, medical condiitions, prescriptions, family medical history etc etc. When I refused to give this information, they said they would not send my Genetic results unless I completed the questionair. I believe it is unlawful to require this personal and medical information.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh I don't think this is accurate. I know ...
customer_reviews.text: Ehhhh I don't think this is accurate. I know I am half Russian and it says I am 1% Russian. Also, they have you fill out a questionnaire about your health and I believe that's what they use to advise you not the actual dna.
customer_reviews.author: rqMD

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: What a total waste of money! They basically gave me a macro list to follow, menu of foods to eat, and said I was sensitive to gluten. There was nothing individualized to me... trying to see you a ton of supplements! Such a joke, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Barker

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and unique product
customer_reviews.text: The test is easy to use and understand. Great and simple instructions. Easy to navigate website and concise questionnaire. The detailed health portion is unique. Customer service is amazing and they care about their product. They have expanded their ancestry portion to enhance their product. This is a unique product which yields a lot of health information others will not if needing guidance on diet and exercise. Again, customer service is amazing and will help you with any questions or concerns
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I HAD IN MIND
customer_reviews.text: total disappointment , thin disguise to sell you vitamins , heritage information vague , health information maybe 10 % accurate . I bought 2 , one for me and one for my wife . I sent mine in first to see how it would go . now that I know , I 'm having trouble returning the other kit . Possible because it took to long to process .
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these kits for my two adopted ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these kits for my two adopted children who were both wanting insight into their genetic roots. The product description makes no mention of it but Vitagene will not process any kits for anyone under the age of 18. I'm out the cost of two kits as it's been too long to get a refund from amazon so I called Vitagene and all they said sorry you should have read the term and conditions on our website. 9/21/2018: Update Someone from Vitagene ended up contacting me based on my original review and they helped me out. Ended up getting the test results. My daughter (oldest) especially loved learning about where she came from.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bieker

customer_reviews.title: BE ADVISED
customer_reviews.text: They do not give you detailed results like Ancestry.com does. I would pay the $ difference. I ordered from Ancestry later as I was not happy with the general results and sure enough were way more detailed so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great information you need to make smart choices regarding your health and fitness!
customer_reviews.text: Just like most people, as I get older I try to be more healthy. I exercise by walking and hiking, but is it enough? I don't diet but I do try to eat healthy. I submitted the dna test kit and received my results. You take a very quick questionnaire and when the results come in, you will get diet, exercise and supplement reports, in addition to the genetic and ancestry reports. I got a good look at how I metabolize certain things and how my body responds to exercise. With this helpful information I can make smart choices and make lasting changes for my health.
customer_reviews.author: Jen k

customer_reviews.title: There was no information that was useful. It makes generic statements about exercising and food ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this test, I thought I will learn something new for my health. Turns out that its an advertisement to sell their supplement vitamins to us. There was no information that was useful. It makes generic statements about exercising and food habits. It picks up most of the information from the information that you fill up on their portal like the BMI. Seems I have wasted my money on it. Now they are ready to set up a free appointment for 15 minutes so they sell their supplements. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: unending

customer_reviews.title: So excited to determine my heritage!
customer_reviews.text: As a full-blown "American mutt", I've never been entirely sure how many nationalities I represent! Have been wanting to figure this out for awhile and when I learned I could not only do that but adjust my health regimen to what will work best for the "real me", I couldn't wait to try it! This was so simple to use and after a short online questionnaire Vitagene knows my health concerns and can help me address them. Just a quick cheek swab and you're done. Highly recommend this product for ease of use and extent of information received.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri G

customer_reviews.title: This one by far explains ancestry in depth to where you can understand exactly where you came from AND has the best fitness/diet tests/explanations out there
customer_reviews.text: I've tried almost all of the popular DNA tests: Ancestry, 23youandme, and DNAfit. This one by far explains ancestry in depth to where you can understand exactly where you came from AND has the best fitness/diet tests/explanations out there. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews on a regular basis, but I wanted to say that Vitagene's results were completely inaccurate. They said that based on my DNA, I am mostly Central Asian, Eastern European, and slightly Middle Eastern but as far back as my extended family roots go, we've never left Northern India. You folks need better resources to check our DNA.
customer_reviews.author: Kanwaldeep K. Sekhon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This DNA test kit would make a beautiful gift. I got mine and one look at how well it is made and presented I immediately thought that I should give this to some of my friends for Holidays. It is truly a gift of health, and for myself, it was a great investment. I am waiting for the results now. The part that I was mostly worried about - how easy it will actually be to collect the samples and to send them, turned out to be so simple. They really thought of every detail. Anything that you may possibly need is in the box. Great product, cannot wait for my results to come in!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: you are given a nice breakdown of what you should consume
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait a bit for the results of Vitagene DNA but it was well worth the wait. Not only do you receive a detailed account of your potential background , but you also receive a full detailed recommendation of what your dietary consumption should be made up of. After submitting your DNA (which is completely painless) to Vitagene, you are asked to set up an account with the site, from there you are asked specific questions regarding your current health and overall lifestyle. Through this and the resourceful information obtained through your DNA submission, you are given a nice breakdown of what you should consume.
customer_reviews.author: Queenasali1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use for ancestry
customer_reviews.text: Everything is very generic, single line statements that give little direction. The ancestry analysis only gets you to the region ie Europe and no closer. No specific country nor any details. Very dissapointed in what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: L Has

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to what other dna services offer but they provide more insight to the body and dna. They explain The body type and what exercises would you benefit the most and least from. What vitamins you may be lacking. Again, this is all from a dna perspective. The online setup was easy. My only gripe is that when I looked online for results in the end of December 2017, they sent an email saying my results were in January 2018 and Severa times after that. I don’t mind the notification but at least get it right. Remind me. Don’t tell me it’s in and didn’t review the results when I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: There is a section on where you are from like other kits
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have done a DNA kit. There is a section on where you are from like other kits. The part I was excited about was the medical breakdowns. They gave me a list of vitamins and supplements to take - that is amazing. I have started taking 2 of them so far and can tell a difference. If
customer_reviews.author: M Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: More than just DNA
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than just a DNA test. The kit was incredibly easy to use, and the instructions are clear. However, it doesn't end there. Once you activate your kit, the site has you fill out a questionnaire about your activity levels, health goals, and eating habits. The goal of this kit is to help you better your life. The DNA part helps them tailor it to you specifically. I love this idea, and im so glad I picked this brand.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Helped me with my diet, skin and vitamin deficiency. My health has improved thanks to this kit! So worth the price! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Duece

customer_reviews.title: They just wanna sell you vitamins! They sat you ...
customer_reviews.text: They just wanna sell you vitamins! They sat you what nationality you identify with so of course they just guess countries with that same nationality.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Finally my questions will be answered!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super excited about this test kit! I was adopted as an infant, so this will answer so many questions for me! The directions are clear and this is easy to do. The only thing I don't like about this product is having to wait for the results-haha. All things considered, I shouldn't have spent the money, but the information this kit provides is going to be totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Olson

customer_reviews.title: No Results, No Response from Vitagene Labs
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a christmas gift, followed the instructions, sent it in, and now here it is March 2nd, never received any results, no response to my phone calls, no response at all. So unless you like to flush your hard earned money down the toliet, don't buy Vitagene's Unique Like You kit.
customer_reviews.author: LOMO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandma and mom. They loved it. Not only did they find out about their ancestors but they also found out about their health and what exercises they need to do and what vitamins are needed in their diet. This was an amazing gift for them. The only thing that they didn't like was that it took 2 months to get the results but the results were worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not a DNA genetics report-just a gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be similar to the Ancestry DNA testing, but it seems to just be an expensive gimmick to sell vitamin supplements. My husband was thoroughly disgusted that he never got a DNA report like I got with my Ancestry DNA test.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie A

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy from this seller. I am so upset. I gave this to my son's girlfriend as a gift and the activation won't work and it is missing swabs!!!!!!!! I am awaiting their response to make it right. Update pending...
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: The process was very easy. I did not experience any delays in my results being processed due to Covid-19. I actually got my results sooner than estimated. I am satisfied with my purchase and highly recommend Vitagene.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The DNA aspect is good but over all disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing as it was marketed to be "so informative re nutrition and health", Not true--they simply accept the info you tell them about yourself...info I already knew. The DNA aspect is good but over all disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: NorthwestNana

customer_reviews.title: Very simple test
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get what I expected... Asking bunch of lifestyle questions and most of the suggestions based on my lifestyle... for example I didn't see any good explanation why my caffeine processing metabolism is slow. It says 40% genes, 60% lifestyle.... what is that mean? Ancestry is very simple and don't tell anything that you don't know. In my opinion this is waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet Cem KAYA

customer_reviews.title: Not much information on Health
customer_reviews.text: For ancestry matters was ok but for health information it was not
customer_reviews.author: cinthia kettering

customer_reviews.title: No value
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for a long time all I get is basic info about what to eat and a supplement plan they recommend, I do not see any value what so ever in this DNA test, waste of money and time, not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Zayn

customer_reviews.title: Supplement advertising
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it was more to get you to buy their supplements than anything. Did give me a little background on my ancestry but that was very minute.
customer_reviews.author: pjm

customer_reviews.title: Open your eyes to culture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and was so shocked to find out i was dead wrong about my heritage. The is so enlightening and such a cool thing to do. It beings you closer to your family and your heritage and opens your eyes to a whole new culture you didn't know you were part of. I bought several as gifts
customer_reviews.author: The Advantaged Yacht Charters

customer_reviews.title: Results Are Vague
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat disappointed. While they do give you some ethnicity information, it's all pretty generic. Yeah I'm almost all western European, I pretty much knew that. I wondered how German I was, but I didn't get that information. There was also some information about how diet and exercise work for you based on your genetic make up, but it didn't seem very actionable and everything seemed like the generic advice that is given to anyone. It did say my body was less likely to respond to exercise, so now I have an excuse to not go to the gym. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not really useful information
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the results expected real ready to use information
customer_reviews.author: Kandyce

customer_reviews.title: It recommended both a vitamin regimen and informed me of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comprehensive and enlightening. It recommended both a suppliment regimen and informed me of the best types of exercises given my genetics. The ancestral breakdown was also very accurate for me as well and also more detailed than I expected It to be. It even revealed regions below 1 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thorough and Informative Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the quality and detail that the package information contained. I received my kit in less than twenty four hours, and was able to quickly fill out the forms in a reasonable amount of time-- the instructions are straightforward and easy to follow. It was great to receive detailed ancestry information as well as DNA information. The explanations given are easy to understand and compelled me to make some daily changes to feel better. Overall, a very thorough and informative product. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking to improve their overall health and wellbeing.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm already seeing positive results from the recommendations from the results of my test! Easy and fast also valuable information in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R

customer_reviews.title: I thought this product was great. The kit came right away and was simple ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was great. The kit came right away and was simple to use. I had a guestion and the support team helped right away. I would say the results were predictable and surprising at the same time. Well worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: kathy graves

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and very informational
customer_reviews.text: After a conversation with my personal trainer I ordered this to find out about my demographic background and basic health stats. I wasn't too sure what to expect, but the results blew my mind. I received my stats and it broke down my ethnic makeup and a whole lot about my personal health. I would definitely recommend this for the price and speed of results.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Rae

customer_reviews.title: Loved Vitagene. If you are looking for a DNA ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved Vitagene. If you are looking for a DNA test with results that focus on diet and exercise, then this is the test for you. There was so much information in various categories. My results came back in about 5 weeks so that was shorter than most other tests.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, good turnaround time.
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to do one of these DNA tests for quite a while, just to kind of fill in the gaps for me. The results you receive from Vitagene are so much more than just ethnicity percentages, though. So informative. It was fun to receive and find out all this new information.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This test was so simple and so easy. You are buying a product that will end up giving you so much information about yourself and your health. I received my results and it gave me insight to my ancestry that i didn't know about and gave me insight into my health that I need to take into consideration. It made me think about my past health struggles as well and how my genetics are all related to it! Best money I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Aroyan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Gave me my ethnicity breakdown which I was very surprised to see the results. Also gives a nutrition and exercise analysis. What I like about this company is that they continue to email you and update your profile as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great from start to finish. The results came in fast and seemed accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: We loved all the info it gave us
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands birthday and we’re very impressed with the information. It was easy and we got the results sooner than expected. Plus you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: BAD!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy! Sad I had to give 1 star because they do not deserve even a one star. It did not pick up my grandmothers American Indian DNA. They replied it is not set up for it yet however in the information it showed before I purchased it that American Indian was detected. All they are interested in is selling you vitamin products. Neither Amazon or Vitagen will accept responsibility. Each said the other is responsible for the false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn shashaguay

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Maybe got the ancestry tight but the medical part of it not at all
customer_reviews.author: Francois

customer_reviews.title: impossible to access
customer_reviews.text: it might seem very simple but when I try to activate the sample kit. it has been imposible!
customer_reviews.author: AIDA

customer_reviews.title: I already knew many of the things in the report but it was still fun to get this DNA test done
customer_reviews.text: Process is simple: swab your cheeks and send in your samples. The anticipation for my report took well over 1.5 months. I already know that I am 100% Chinese but it would have been interesting to see which parts of China my ancestors came from. The report is lengthy and contains pages of information. Mostly general information about Nutrition, diet, exercise and how to maintain your health based on your DNA sample. I already knew many of the things in the report but it was still fun to get this DNA test done.
customer_reviews.author: Emi K

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money! Everything it tells you is from a 7th grade health class. It asks you which suppliments you already take and then tries to sell you theirs. The ancestry part was the only intersting part but only gives general South Central Asia or Eastern European. Gives one liners like “you may be likely to have a gluton sensitivety” or “you are not likely to tolerate lactose”. Very general and not personal at all. Purchase 23nme or Ancestry if the heritage part of that interests you. Speak to a middle school child about health if you want more information on diet and excercise
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother! Results are vague
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother! The results are so vague. It came back with 90% "eastern european" and 10% "western european". That's about as specific as the report got. Not even down to a country or region (like polish or german or croatian). And the health results were just as bad. Saying "you may have" a sensitivity to caffeine. Absolutely worthless. Said I can drink milk, but I have been dairy intolerant all my life. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L.G

customer_reviews.title: Never received my results
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back never heard back with my results
customer_reviews.author: Pam Beninato

customer_reviews.title: Good info. Not doing the supplements though
customer_reviews.text: Really good information and great info for the price, but seems that their business depends on supplements, making me a bit more skeptical to follow any of their suggested plans.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This was beyond cool. You get to learn about your history and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was beyond cool. You get to learn about your history and your diet, and so much more. It was worth the money for the experience to know all this information. I've already started to change my diet and am doing more research within the results. Very cool experience.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Live everyday to the fullest, healthy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Vitagene will let you know all about your health and how you should change or not change diet, exercise, what to look out for etc. True on my remarks from what mom and dad shared with me about their families.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hill

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, and good information with fast service
customer_reviews.text: The test was really fast, which stood out compared to the other services out there. Ancestry was a little lacking, but still very interesting to see my background. Vitagene focuses more on the health aspect of your DNA, and it is very interesting to see what parts of my health are lacking, and need help, as well as those parts that dont need much focus. All in all, excellent product, and good information with fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Abteen

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected at all
customer_reviews.text: This product does not offer similar perks that 23andme and ancestry. It's all fake information they make you answer questions in the beginning that basically auto input medical information. No information on your health is gathered. The ancestral part was probably the worst in the industry.

customer_reviews.title: The paper copy of the test report is no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: The paper copy of the test report is no longer part of the test cost. You'll need to log on and review your report online, unlike the paper copy that is mentioned in all their customer reviews, etc. Not really worth the money. There were many things they described in the report I knew already and other things I felt that were missed. Very disappointing after waiting almost a month.
customer_reviews.author: jmaze

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Previously I received a message from Vitagene that this kit was not authorized. After showing proof of purchase the kit was activated and I was able to use it. The seller was very quick in responding and helped in the resolution. I'm very happy with this experience, despite the initial hiccup.
customer_reviews.author: SaraM

customer_reviews.title: Finally know my Ancestry
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I now know my ancestral background as well as how to take care of my body based on my DNA. I strongly believe that the way we choose products will eventually be based on DNA rather than just randomly guessing based on product reviews. There are certain ingredients that our bodies work well with and others not so much. Vitagene is onto something that has great potential and I hope they continue to do well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Shyun

customer_reviews.title: Hummmm
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. Basicly a step up to sell vitamins though.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great D.N.A and health test
customer_reviews.text: This test is amazing. It gives you a genetic profile and health profile as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Who are you?
customer_reviews.text: Love the continuous information I receive on my medical and genetic pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lorella N.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift! My friend was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit as a gift for a friend of mine. What I like about this solution is that it not only gives you information about your genetics but actually provides a recommendation on stuff that you can do to improve your health and get to your goals. If you have any health-conscious friends - they would thank you a million times! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Evi M

customer_reviews.title: I would have like more detail about my genes
customer_reviews.text: did not say much about my results just a lot of maybes and not much about my ancestry just a general statement. I would have like more detail about my genes. I had to go to a different site to get more detail. The only thing I like is I could get the raw data to use the other site.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: It is interesting
customer_reviews.text: It is fun and somewhat interesting, but scientific doesn't seem coherent
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Not only do you get yours heritage results but this is truly a tree whose branches go in more directions bringing ongoing result
customer_reviews.text: Awesome birthday gift for my 21 year old son who has always been so intrigued with heritage.....looking so forward to the results
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a waste of time. After several months what I got was a map of ancestry and raw of the genetic components. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They were floored! I don't know how the process went but they were certainly happy with it initially.
customer_reviews.author: kstall

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took the test so my kids have a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was adopted and was told that I was English, German and Swedish. Results were surprising. Turned out that I am part Russian. This explains my life long interest in this country! No German. Glad I took the test so my kids have a better understanding of their heritage
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend if you want a detailed report
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend if you want a detailed report. Very vague. You don't even know how it applies to you.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Likely and unlikely is interesting
customer_reviews.text: some parts are interested, like what vitamins my chemistry tends to lack. I ordered some on amazon to try out. for the diet part, duh, should stay away from too much fat and sodium. It's been 6 weeks and ancestry is still not done. Report for the vitamin part came as a nicely printed piece in the mail as well as an on line version.
customer_reviews.author: Cari M.

customer_reviews.title: Tells your body’s genetic tendencies concerning health!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product! This was a very humbling and “aha” experience. I learned more about genetic influences on my body than I ever have. In my opinion, this is a key product for any diet plan. This will tell you EXACTLY what to do for your body to perform at its peak!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 4 weeks after they receive it for results, have not received my results yet
customer_reviews.author: dyan

customer_reviews.title: Very informative. I wish they broke down the DNA ...
customer_reviews.text: Very informative. I wish they broke down the DNA into countries instead of only regions. Had to call to get this information. Results showed up on line after 3 weeks . Report came in the mail after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to know my ancestry and now I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not specific - to general and to much followup nonscence
customer_reviews.author: joseph M. Tygart

customer_reviews.title: Great insight!
customer_reviews.text: The information that Vitagene has provided based on my DNA is wonderful! It has given me knowledge that can help me make better choices in my diet and exercise. I realize that even if my DNA gives an indication of a risk factor, the report provided gives recommendations that are very helpful for my future health.
customer_reviews.author: Nojan K

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t received results after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 months and still haven’t received my results 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rhianon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: What happened to my results???????
customer_reviews.text: Never obtained the results from this although I did receive and returned the swab kit?????
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Supplements are great. I followed through and did the whole plan
customer_reviews.text: Simple but exceeded my expectations. Supplements are great. I followed through and did the whole plan. I love the skin care feature.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix  carnevale

customer_reviews.title: Bought for husband
customer_reviews.text: He was extremely happy with the results and it was fast too
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best DNA test on the market
customer_reviews.text: This HAS to be the BEST DNA kit on the market!!! It's results are super in depth and very helpful in knowing exactly what you should be eating for your genetics. Amazing A+++ loved mine so much I bought one for my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: The lab work was pretty standard and easy to complete
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly impressed with what I’m able to learn about myself including recommendations for diet, fitness, and supplementation, as well as ancestry. The lab work was pretty standard and easy to complete. Satisfied with my purchase and recommend this to anyone else who wants to learn more about their bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but if you are looking for information ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but if you are looking for information on your heritage this kit is a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Started Skeptical - Came Out Super Excited
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been curious my ancestry but have been a bit skeptical about the whole DNA analysis kit things. I finally decided to just try it out and I can say I’m honestly really happy that I did. The kit was simple, organized, had extremely easy to follow instructions and the collection process only took a few minutes. I really enjoyed that the provide you with details on the testing process and the results and that you can track the process online with your own personal code. I went it skeptical but came out super excited, so much so that we are ordering another test for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I would definately recommend Vitagene, they have great customer service and take the time to explain your results.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kaczmarek

customer_reviews.title: Good information to have
customer_reviews.text: Got my results back the other day. Pleasantly surprised that it came in about a month before the date they gave me. I wasn't so interested in the ancestry aspect of it as I was the health aspect. It gives some detailed information about caffeine, blood sugar, the types of foods that work best for you and so much more. Some of the information was a little off in comparison to what I actually experience, but again, it's not a medical diagnosis in anyway. Most lined up with what my doctors have already told me - I'm healthy. It's a great place to start in continuing or getting healthy. Loved the recommendations, especially in regards to vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: family
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get any references to ancestry. just wanted to sell vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible. such useless info.  want refund.
customer_reviews.text: terrible. such useless info, and the info is different from 23and me and *five* other dna/heritage tests i took. how is it possible to have different heritage based on which company i use? now, i dont know which is accurate and which isnt. what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: They should be better sealed. Was too easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful as only one vial had solution. They should be better sealed. Was too easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. You get info, but telling me what my gene type is without any explanation is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie2014

customer_reviews.title: One of the most complete kits I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for this. The instructions are very clear and in the end you get a personalized book with your results. I feel this is a very complete service, because you'll not only find out about your ancestry, but you will also get to learn about what vitamins, exercise and diet plan is best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shakibing

customer_reviews.title: So excited!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO excited to have found this! I think it is amazing all the things it can tell you (ancestry, diet recommendations, exercise, and supplementation action plans based on your DNA). I have recently gotten more into fitness, so I am excited to not only learn where I come from, but to learn about diet and exercise as well! Super easy, quick process (just swab your cheeks and mail it back in the prepaid box)!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: This is about selling supplements, no real value here
customer_reviews.text: While this promotes it's going to give you insight to diet and exercise, it really doesn't. This is a basic analysis of how much protein you should eat based on your calorie count they give you. If you know your general ancestry, and you know your approximate BMI, there are no real insights to what you could or should do. It's really about selling their supplements so don't be fooled that you'll get much value out of this. Even their exercise comments are vague, "you may be less responsive to weight loss through exercise than others".
customer_reviews.author: Leila H Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: family importants
customer_reviews.text: gave me answers on what my ancestry and health , I did not know
customer_reviews.author: Janet Landry

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a straight forward kid to use. I'm so excited about the price as well. I can't wait to get the results! They also have a track your process option on the website...I am so impatient, I know I'm going to be checking every day! Check out my video for more about Vitagene!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pike

product_meta.title: Vitagene DNA Test Kit: Personal Ancestry + Health Personal Genetic Reports
product_meta.description: What information will I learn? Your Health + Ancestry Report includes a breakdown of your ancestry, as well as diet, exercise, and supplementation plans. Your results will include personalized food and supplement lists, as well as customizable exercise regimens, in addition to your ancestry, providing a complete picture of you. How does the Vitagene process work? A DNA kit with a prepaid return label will be shipped to you 3-5 days after purchase. Follow the instructions included with your testing kit to complete and return your sample. You will receive your results through your online dashboard 4-6 weeks after you have returned your sample and completed your questionnaire. How long does it take to receive my results? You will receive your results 4-6 weeks from the time that our lab receives your completed sample. That's 2-3 weeks quicker turnaround time than most other DNA testing companies. Is my data protected? Vitagene uses industry standard security practices to store and protect your DNA sample, results, and any additional information you provide. Your results and DNA sample are stored without any identifying information and your physical sample is destroyed after it is processed. Vitagene does not share your information with any third party without your explicit consent. How accurate are my results? 1. Your results are analyzed using only the latest available research in the fields of genetics, nutrition, and exercise. 2. All saliva swab samples are processed in CLIA-certified and CAP-accredited labs. 3. The Vitagene DNA testing kit is manufactured in accordance with the FDA's Good Manufacturing Practice regulations. 4. Genotyping, the process in which Vitagene processes your sample, is a well-established and reliable way to analyze DNA.
feature_bullets: The Vitagene DNA test is a more complete and affordable test for ancestry and health.
The only DNA test that tells you exactly which foods, exercises, and vitamins are right for you.
Explore a detailed breakdown of your genetic ancestry.
Quicker results - simple two minute saliva test, results in just 4-6 weeks.
Let us be your partner in designing a lifestyle your future self with thank you for.
